title: The divide between culture reporter and critic closes
description: Much of early TV culture writing focused on helping viewers keep up, but that model is slowly giving way to a more interpretive kind of work. In 2026, the distance between culture writers and critics will narrow in ways that reshape the field. A hybrid model — one that blends reporting, interpretation, and criticism —...
